DISCOVER THE NEW OAKWOOD WORLDWIDE

When your business needs an extended-stay housing solution, turn to the provider with unparalleled reach and industry expertise: Oakwood Worldwide®. As the global leader in corporate housing and serviced apartments, we’re prepared to be your strategic partner, deploying custom solutions to meet all of your company’s needs.

By leveraging the best practices and vast presence of our two industry-leading brands – Oakwood® and ExecuStay® – Oakwood Worldwide enables you to mobilize your team virtually anywhere you do business, with minimal disruption and maximy. We offer distinctive, furnished residences in all 50 states and in more than 55 countries worldwide.

Our industry leadership and extensive offerings makary homes in bustling city centers or suburban outposts around the world. So whether your employees need a place to stay while relocating to a new city or are working on a multi-month project and prefer a furnished apartment instead of a hotel, Oakwood Worldwide can take care of the details and set your team up for success.

A Total Solution For Your Housing Program

  • Flexible Inventory
  • Local Knowledge
  • Global Quality Controls
  • Custom, Seamless Solutions
  • Comprehensive Reporting & Analytics
  • Dedicated, Experienced Account Management
